name: BUTLER GUILLOTINE
description:
Still here ?

Still breathing ?

But you don't recall a thing.

This place is done for.

You should leave, right now.

Anywhere, I don’t care, 
just stay on the move.

Quick, they’re coming for your head, 

 

They’re coming for our heads.

There is nowhere  for us to go,

Just burn it down,

Burn it all down.

~ Playtime is roughly 10 minutes

Wander the endless hallways of the Limen hotel in search of answers, an atmospheric and unsettling exploration game with fixed camera angles

> Most objects can be interacted with using the interact button
> Using a controller is highly advised 
> The inventory is bugged in mouse and keyboard mode and doesn't open, it doesn't affect gameplay however

Controller (xbox) : Left stick to move, B to interact, A to select text option, L2 to open inventory 

Mouse and keyboard : ZQSD (WASD in options menu) to move, space to interact, arrow keys to navigate menus and enter to select text option (mouse also works naturally)
